title: Keller Independent School District - Cancellation of 'The Laramie Project'

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Keller Independent School District - Cancellation of 'The Laramie Project'
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All records reflecting the reasons, rationale, or basis for the decision (by any of the "many stakeholders" referenced by Bryce Nieman's statement to the Dallas Morning News) to cancel the production of "The Laramie Project."

This request includes, but is not limited to:

(a) any emails, text messages, or other communications sent or from any of the "stakeholders" which references the play (whether by name or implication);
(b) any calendar entries or invitations concerning any meeting during which "The Laramie Project" was discussed; and
(c) any audio, video, or written recording of any meeting during which "The Laramie Project" was discussed, including any Zoom, Webex, or similar recording.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh

title: Vehicle Pursuit Dashcam video and body camera (Cobb County Police Department)

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Vehicle Pursuit Dashcam video and body camera (Cobb County Police Department)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of dashcam and or bodycam video of police pursuits from 01/02/2021 to 01/02/2024.  I would like vehicle and foot pursuits.  Please include an abbreviated processing note for each video

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Michael Faulkner

communications.subject: Open Records Request :: R000561-022624
communications.communication:
Dear Michael Faulkner: 
 
Thank you for your interest in Open Records of Cobb County, Georgia. 
 
This is acknowledgement that we have received your request for records on February 26, 2024 and it has been assigned the reference number R000561-022624 for tracking purposes. 
 
Record(s) Requested: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of dashcam and or bodycam video of police pursuits from 01/02/2021 to 01/02/2024. I would like vehicle and foot pursuits. Please include an abbreviated processing note for each video

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Michael Faulkner

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fcobb-county-police-department-5718%252Fvehicle-pursuit-dashcam-video-and-body-camera-cobb-county-police-department-159320%252F%253Femail%253Dpoliceopenrecordsofficer%252540cobbcounty.org&url_auth_token=AAAczoynctsZqkpPRdeDS-WfBYQ%3A1ren4m%3A42C9qvcn52GGofxOdM4u91e4rSLhgeaXaiu7zKy9VIk 
 
Your request will be forwarded to the relevant person(s) to locate the information you seek and determine the volume and costs associated with satisfying your request. You will be contacted about the availability and/or provided with copies of the records responsive to your request. 
 
Please visit the Cobb County Open Records Center to monitor request progress, download responsive records, and submit future requests.
